name: RETROSPACE: DUNGEON
description:
A very short and cryptic horror roguelite. Enter a disturbing dungeon simulation and confront the things that should have been left locked away in the past.

  • PSX inspired graphics
  • ~5-10 minutes long
  • rooms are randomly generated
  • 1 mistake = instant death
  • very barebones (pun intended)

CONTROLS

KEYACTIONWASDMOVESPACEJUMPSHIFTSPRINTCTRLSNEAKEINTERACT

DEVELOPERS NOTICE

 This "game" was made for the 7 Day Roguelike Challenge of 2023 as well as my first attempt at making a 3D game. Although it's somewhat incomplete due to some personal issues I had to deal with, I'm still happy to release it. just hope nothing breaks apart

Constructive criticism is more than welcome!

Programming, Models, Textures and Sounds made by me, created in Unity
